data.description_html:
You create a wave of sonic energy that is harmful to incorporeal creatures.
The target creature cannot avoid the damage with its incorporeal miss chance and takes 1d6 points of sonic damage per two caster levels.
All creatures in adjacent squares take 1 point of sonic damage from the residual effects of the energy wave.
Focus: A silver tuning fork.
data.name: Incorporeal Disharmonics
data.target: One incorporeal creature and see text
